summary: Defines the Text UI control and related selection event class, enabling rendering of styled and rich text within Flet applications, with extensive customization options such as font properties, colors, alignment, overflow handling, line limits, animations, badges, tooltips, and responsive behavior.
business_intent: Give developers a versatile, theme-aware text component that can display simple or richly formatted content and react to user selection changes, simplifying UI construction and interaction handling in Flet-based applications.
